rent-your-bike.subheader: Meet like-minded and make some pocket money

berlin-triathlon.meta-title: Rent a road bike for Berlin Triathlon 2019 | listnride
berlin-triathlon.meta-description: Rent a road bike securely online with listnride for Berlin Triathlon 2019. Choose the perfect bike that fits your need.

berlin-triathlon-xl.description-delete-me: What: <b0>Berlin Triathlon XL</b0>  |  Where: <b1>Berlin</b1>  |  When: <b2>23 June 2019</b2>
berlin-triathlon-xl.text-delete-me:
Do you need a road bike for Berlin Triathlon 2019 XL? We have one for you! Together with the listnride community, we provide suitable road bikes which you can easily rent for as long as you like. Just choose one of the bikes below, request it for your required period, and pick it up when the time comes. Simple as that.
You can’t participate? Help out someone in need. List your bike and make some extra pocket money!
berlin-triathlon-xl.meta-description: Rent a road bike securely online with listnride for Berlin Triathlon XL 2019. Choose the perfect bike that fits your need.
berlin-triathlon-xl.meta-title: Rent a road bike for Berlin Triathlon XL 2019 | listnride

event.time-error: Please select a pickup time first
event.calendar-subtitle: The UCI Road World Championships will take place in Innsbruck-Tirol (Austria) from 22nd to 30th September 2018. Test and rent the perfect road bike for your ride.

faq.meta-description: The most frequently asked questions by Listers and Riders are answered here to help you get started. Whether you are looking for the perfect bike to rent that serves your needs. Or to list that very special bike of yours.

multi-booking.meta-description: Book your bikes with our group booking form
multi-booking.title: Group bookings
multi-booking.header: We are happy to help you with your group booking
multi-booking.subheader: No more hassle, let us help you to get organized for your next cycling trip. Provide us with your preferences and we'll do the rest, so you can spend maximum time enjoying the ride.

how-to.step-1-content: Save precious time to maximally enjoy the ride at your destination. Easy and transparent, any day any time.
how-to.step-2-content: Tell us what bicycles you would like to rent and we will do the rest. Just provide us the details and we'll get back to you!
how-to.step-3-content: We will send you a quote and a link where you can either book online or you give us a written confirmation for your booking. in the latter case, you will be send invoice that needs to be paid to finalize the booking.

multi-booking.where-to-rent: Where do you want to rent?
multi-booking.thanks-for-request: Thanks for your bike rental request
multi-booking.we-will-back-shortly: We will get back to you shortly
multi-booking.take-back-to-search: Take me back to my search

details.sms-confirmation-message: A SMS with a confirmation code was sent to you just now.
details.subtitle: Please fill in your invoice address in order to request a bike.
details.send-sms: We'll send you one time sms to your phone.
details.enter-code: Enter the pin that we just sent to your phone
details.fail-code: The code you entered is not correct. Try again or resend the SMS

payment.subtitle: Please select your favorite payment method. We only charge you after the lister accepted your request.
payment.invalid-card: Please provide a valid Card Number

overview.premium-insurance-subtitle: Pick our premium insurance for your ride to be on the safe side
overview.thats-included: On top of basic insurance, these features are additionally included
overview.premium-feature-2: Replacement bike after accident or damage
overview.premium-feature-3: Return transport of the bike after accident or damage
overview.success-header: Congratulations, you have just requested a bike!
overview.success-subheader: We've sent you a confirmation email. Feel free to book more bikes, afterwards.

calendar.intro-description: Your booking gets safely processed by listnride, Europe's biggest bike sharing community.

toasts.update-profile-success: Your profile has been successfully updated
toasts.error: An error occured. Please make sure your internet connection works and try again.
toasts.add-payout-success: Your payout method was successfully added.
toasts.add-voucher-success: Congratulations, the voucher was added to your account.
toasts.add-voucher-error: Unfortunately, the supplied voucher is not valid.
toasts.verification-email-sent: An email with a confirmation link was sent to your email address. This may take a few minutes, if you didn't receive anything also have a look in your spam folder.
toasts.could-not-sign-up: Could not sign up. It seems the email address provided is already in use.
toasts.successfully-sign-up: You have successfully signed up. Welcome!
toasts.could-not-log-in: Could not log in. Please make sure you're signed up already and your credentials are valid.
toasts.reset-password-success: We've just sent you a new password to your email address! It should arrive in the next few minutes.
toasts.uniq-phone: Phone number already registered in our system.
toasts.pending-requests: Looks like you have an open request for this bike. Before you can delete the bike you need to accept or reject the request.
toasts.duplicate-finish: Duplication process finished. Copies created successfully

To change your name or email address please contact us
via e-mail at: contact@listnride.com
settings.delete-account-description: Here you can dactivate your listnride account. This step can not be undone.
settings.delete-account-sure-description: This step can not be undone.
settings.availability-description: You can set your availability times for renting out bikes.
settings.change-address-info: Updating your address doesn't update the address of your bikes.
settings.payment-method-description: Your payment method is used to pay for your rentals. It can be a credit card or paypal account.
settings.payout-method-description: Your payout method is where we send you your rental income. Therefore you have to add it latest when accepting a request as a lister.
settings.payment-credit-card: Your current payment method is a credit card
settings.payment-paypal: Your current payment method is a paypal account with email address

settings.payout-paypal: Your payout method is a paypal account with email address
settings.payout-bank: Your payout method is a bank account ending with
settings.meta-description: Change your profile - und payment settings.

verification.private-tip: This information will not be open to the public
verification.public-tip: This information will be visible on your profile page

1.text1: Welcome to our passionate bike sharing community, featuring lots of bikes and bike enthusiasts all over the world.
1.text-invited: As you've got invited by a friend, we've just put a voucher in your account. It gets redeemed automatically for your first rental!
1.text2: We're a sharing community, so the trust and safety of you and the other users have highest priority. We therefore kindly ask you to verify your profile through a few simple steps. The better the information you enter, the higher are chances that your requests will be accepted and bikes will be requested.

2.title: Upload your profile picture
2.description: Show other user who is the person behind your profile.
2.business-description: Having your logo shown on listnride is a great way to attract more request

3.title: Tell something about yourself or shop
3.label: Description (min. 50 Characters)

4.description: Validate your email address by clicking on the link in the confirmation email that we've sent to you after signup. If you don't find it anymore, you can resend the email. If you don't receive it instantly, please wait a few minutes and look in your spam folder.

5.title: What is your phone number
5.description: Verify your phone number, this allows SMS notifications for your requests. Simply enter your number and click 'Send Confirmation'. You'll receive a code via SMS that you can then enter below.

ratings.title: How did you like the overall experience?
ratings.description: Trust and Safety are our paramount concern. By writing a short review, you'll help the whole community.
ratings.rating_text_rider: Please summarize your rental experience in a few sentences. The lister will do the same
ratings.rating_text_lister: Please summarize your rental experience in a few sentences. The rider will do the same

requests.complete-profile-description: To book the bike, please enter your payment information. All informations are transmitted over a secure connection.
requests.no-requests-yet: As soon as there are requests, they'll show up here.

message.documents-description: Here you can download your insurance certificates. These documents have also been sent to you by email.

listChat.1: {{user.first_name}} {{user.last_name}} from {{user.city}} would like to rent your {{ride.name}} from {{timespan}}. Agree on further details using the chat.
listChat.5:
Thanks for confirming retrieval of your bike and rating {{user.first_name}}. The rental was successful and the money will get transferred to the bank account you provided during the next 7 working days.

In case of any further questions or feedback, we’d love to receive them under hello@listnride.com
listChat.8: You rejected the request. Please tell the rider why you can't rent him the bike.
listChat.10: Your request was cancelled by system

rideChat.1: You would like to rent the {{ride.name}} from {{lister.business_name}} from {{timespan}}. Agree with the lister on further details. As soon as he accepts your request, the bike gets booked.
rideChat.11: The booking of your rental bike was cancelled.
rideChat.3:
Congratulation, {{lister.first_name}} has accepted your request, so the bike was successfully booked. Meet the lister as agreed and pick up the bike. Contact details are as follows, we've also sent them to you via email.

Name: {{lister.first_name}} {{lister.last_name}},
Phone: {{lister.pretty_phone_number}},
Address: {{ride.street}}, {{ride.zip}} {{ride.city}}, {{ride.country}}
rideChat.5: {{lister.first_name}} has confirmed the return of the ride and gave you a review. Finally, please also rate the ride. This helps our community a lot and completes the rental.
rideChat.6: Thanks for rating, the rental was successfully completed.
rideChat.8: Unfortunately, the lister could't accept your request. Simply request some other great bikes.
rideChat.9: You cancelled the request, please tell the lister why you couldn’t confirm the booking.

forms.sign-up-to-book: Sign up to book the bike
forms.agree-terms-and-policy: Agree to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
forms.profile-picture-info: Please upload only formats as jpg, jpeg, png. Maximum size is 20mb. Minimum dimension is 100px x 100px.
forms.profile-picture-info-policy: By uploading a picture, I agree that listnride saves the picture as described in the Privacy Policy. I can delete it at any time.
forms.profile-picture-size-error: Your picture size is more than the allowed maximum size
forms.profile-picture-dimension-error: Your picture dimension is lower than minimum
forms.company-contact-info: Please fill form with company contact person information.
forms.signing-up-accept-tac: I hereby agree to the Terms and Conditions and agree to the collection, processing and use of my personal data as further described in the Privacy Policy.
forms.signing-up-accept-newsletter: I would like to receive the listnride e-mail newsletter with interesting content on cycling, community updates and exclusive benefits. The Privacy Policy of listnride applies. I can revoke my consent at any time.
forms.privacy-policy: The Privacy Policy of listnride applies.

errors.valid-email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.min-size-company-name: Company name should be longer than 2 characters

home.landing-section-header: The perfect bike. Simply rent it.

insurance.description: No matter if minimalistic fixie or high-end triathlon bike: Every listnride rental in Germany or Austria is insured! Simple. Unbureaucratically. Anytime.
insurance.header: Insurance for your rental on listnride
insurance.logo-description: In cooperation with hepster and insured by

home.landing-section-subheader: Join listnride and find the bike that is right for you.
home.featured-bikes-subheader: Whether it’s road bikes, mountain bikes, cargo bikes, city bikes or e-bikes, you can rent them all. These are the current favorite rental bikes of the community.
home.featured-tiles-subheader: We are partnering with innovative bike brands, which offer their latest models for testing.  The bikes can be tested or rented exclusively at various locations. Perfect for a well-considered buying decision.
home.featured-cities-header: With listnride you are never without your perfect bike
home.featured-cities-subheader: listnride’s bike rental service is becoming available in more cities and holiday regions around Europe. Here are some tips for you:
home.list-a-bike-header: Got a nice bike and want people to use it?
home.list-a-bike-subheader: List your bike for rent, meet fun new people and earn some extra cash.
home.newsletter-header: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay in the loop
home.newsletter-subheader: Receive our email about new bikes, tours and discounts for your rides.
home.meta-description: Rent your perfect bike from the listnride community. Find one that suits your style and needs.

autocomplete.default-placeholder: Where would you like to rent a bike?

search.no-bikes: There are unfortunately no bikes in this location yet. As we're growing fast, probably soon there will be! If you'd like to, you can list a bike yourself or alternatively try searching for another city or specific location nearby.
search.meta-description: listnride offers a wide variety of perfekt bikes for rent in {{location}}.

calendar.info-service-fee-insurance: helps us run our platform and<br0>allows us to offer first-class customer service.<br1>VAT included. Non-refundable.
calendar.own-bike: You can't request your own bike
calendar.log-in-to-request-description: Log in to request the bike. If you don't have an account yet, feel free to sign up.
calendar.select-timespan-description: Before you can request, please set the time span of your rental. Simply click on the days and select pickup and dropoff times in the above calendar.
calendar.info-subtotal:
This is the regular daily price
times the amount of rental days
.
calendar.info-discount:
Average daily discount you
get per day by renting out
for a longer period of time.
calendar.info-service-fee:
helps us run our platform and
allows us to offer first-class customer service.
VAT included. Non-refundable.
calendar.info:
In the calendar, select first
the day you wish to rent
out the bike, and second
the day you want to return it.
calendar.info-without-calendar: In the calendar, select first the start date of your rental then the return date.  Secondly select start time and end time.

category.hint: First, select the category of your bike. Then select the right subcategory.
category.label: Category

details.header: What is your bike name, size & brand?
details.hint: Enter the bike brand, name and a description of your bike. The name should include the model and describe the bike to the point. e.g. Gazelle, Tour Populair, 2013. Then select a range for the appropriate riders height.
details.label: Details
details.name: Name

accessories.header: What accessories does your bike have?
accessories.hint: Edit accessories. Select the accessories, which you can provide with your bike.
accessories.label: Accessories

pictures.header: Upload some pictures of your bike
pictures.hint: Now select some nice pictures of your bike. Here is a guide on how to make your listing look even better.
pictures.how-to: Photo tips for making your listing stand out
pictures.label: Pictures
pictures.upload-bike-header: Upload some pictures of your bike
pictures.under-min-size: Some of your images size is less than the allowable minimum 1500x1000:

location.header: Where can the bike be picked up?
location.hint: Where is your bike located? Don’t worry, the exact location of your bike will ONLY be forwarded when you have confirmed a rental request.
location.label: Location

insurance.label: Insurance
insurance.hint-part-1: Your bike is insured whenever it is rented. In order to provide you with the right protection it's neccessary that you enter the value of your bike.
insurance.hint-part-2: Please note that your have to provide proof of your bike's value in case of any claim
insurance.header: Please tell us the value of your bike
insurance.tip: Additional fee for the rider is {{fee}} per day
insurance.no-insurance:
Sorry, your country is not yet covered by our insurance.
The insurance only applies to rentals in Germany and Austria.

pricing.info: Your daily price is your base price for 1 day.
pricing.description: Your daily price is your base price for 1 day.
pricing.hint-para-1: The price you charge for your bike is up to you. The price should be based on the bike and equipment. To get an idea of market prices, you can view comparable listings.
pricing.hint-para-2: A rental period for less than 6 hours equals a half-day rental, 6 to 24 hours a day’s rental.
pricing.hint-para-3: To encourage longer rentals, some listers set a daily or weekly discount.
pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.daily-discount-tooltip: Discount if the bike is rented for more than a day.
pricing.weekly-discount-tooltip: Discount if the bike is rented for a week or more.

listings.no-bikes: You haven't listed any of your bikes yet.

listingCard.dialog-title: Are you sure you want to delete your bike?
listingCard.dialog-subtitle: The bike will get permanently removed from the platform. Current requests are not affected by this.

rent-a-bike.meta-description: Fantastic selection. Great value for money. Easy online service.
rent-a-bike.title: Don’t just rent any old bike. Rent one that feels like your own.

info-section.header: Rent a bike that is perfect for you
info-section.subheader: One that complements your style and meets your needs. From people like you and me.
info-section.choice-content: The range of bikes offered on listnride is as diverse as our users. Here you will find everything from high-end road bikes and trendy urban bikes to cargo bicycles and bike trailers for kids. Rent a bike that suits your style and meets your needs.
info-section.price-content: The bikes listed on our platform are rented out by private owners as well as specialist dealers and rental services. What’s in it for you: the perfect bike at good value for money.
info-section.easy-content: Find and book your rental bike before going on a trip or simply on the go by using our mobile website.
info-section.covered-content: If you rent a bike in Germany or Austria, insurance is included in the rent. With hepster and the Gothaer Group we have two strong partners at our side to help you in case of emergency.

search-section.header: Where would you like to go?
search-section.subheader: listnride’s bike sharing service is becoming available in more and more locations.

testmonials-section.header: What do our riders say about us?
testmonials-section.subheader: More and more people are discovering the benefits of bike sharing via listnride. Check out some of their testimonials:

list-a-bike.meta-description: Meet fun new people and make some extra pocket money.
list-a-bike.title: Rent out a bike, earn some extra cash
list-a-bike.subtitle: Meet great new people and earn some money on the side, for example for the next bike of your dreams.

calculator-section.header: Let your bike work for you
calculator-section.subheader: Just a few clicks and our slide rule will show you how much you can earn by renting out a bike via listnride
calculator-section.days-per-month: Days per month your bike is rented

info-section.precautions-content: You want to rent out your bike – but not to just anybody. That’s why we verify the identity of all our users for you. And our user ratings help you find out whether they play fair in the bike sharing scene.
info-section.control-content: You decide the daily or weekly rate for your bike(s). It’s completely up to you whether you want to accept a rental request or simply reject it because you can’t or don’t want to lend someone your bike at the moment.
info-section.covered-content: In case of damage and/or theft, our insurance will help you. With hepster and the Gothaer Group we have two strong partners at our side.
info-section.help-content: If you and a renter (rider) encounter a problem and can’t find a solution, we’re there for you – to support you or even resolve the entire issue.

list-section.subheader: Meet great new people and earn some money on the side.
list-section.sign-up: Sign up to list your bike!

testmonials-section.header: Renting out bikes: What do our listers say about us?
testmonials-section.subheader: Many people have already become a sharing part of our listnride community. Read about their personal experiences:

invite-landing.meta-description: Give the gift of cycling! When you invite a friend to listnride, they’ll get a 10€ voucher as soon as they join. When they rent a bike or list their own, you’ll get 10€ too!
invite-landing.subheader: Welcome to listnride, the Bike Sharing Community
invite-landing.subsubheader: listnride is the bike sharing community that brings together cycling enthusiasts of all sorts. Members can rent out their own bikes via our website or app, or rent a bike that perfectly suits their style and needs.
invite-landing.subsubsubheader: You've been invited by {{ name }}. Sign up now and you'll get a 10€ voucher added to your account. It can be used for your next bike rental.
invite-landing.sign-up-get-voucher: Sign up to get the Voucher
invite-landing.explanation-1-description: Find the right bike near you and request it.
invite-landing.explanation-2-description: Book the bike and meet the lister to pick it up.

invite.meta-description: Give the gift of cycling! When you invite a friend to listnride, they’ll get a 10€ voucher as soon as they join. When they rent a bike or list their own, you’ll get 10€ too!
invite.title: Invite Friends and Earn 10€
invite.login: Log in to get your invite link

info-section.header: Earn 10€ credit when a friend accepts your invite and rents a bike or lists one of their own.
info-section.subheader: Are you enthusiastic about listnride and want to spread the word? Then invite your friends to become part of the listnride bike sharing community.

invite-form.subheader: Send this link to your friends and they can activate the voucher. You'll get rewarded with a 10€ credit as soon they list or rent a bike.

rider.subheader: Recommend your friends to listnride! We add € 10 for his first booking! And if your friend makes use of it, there is another €10 credit for you. A nice Win-Win!

lister.subheader: Would you recommend us to your friends? We’ll add €10 for his first booking! And if your friend makes use of it, there is another 10€ credit for your next rental. A nice Win-Win!

invitations.header: Your friends have earned you {{ credit }}€

status.1: Signed up but has not listed or rented a bike
status.2: Signed up and rented a bike
status.3: Signed up and listed a bike

share.email-subject: {{full_name}} has invited you to join listnride!
share.email-body: {{first_name}} has given you 10€ for your first adventure on the bike of your choice!  Join listnride, the fastest growing bike sharing community, and get access to countless bikes for every purpose! Sign up and immediately receive a 10€ credit. {{voucher_url}} Do you want to thank {{first_name}}? Rent a bike or list your bike and {{first_name}} receives a 10€ credit, too! Have fun, and enjoy the ride!

error-404.title: 404 Page not found
error-404.details: The page you are looking for does not exist!

seo.rent-category-bikes-in: A large choice of rental bikes

availability.modal-title: When is your bike not available?
